channel.title: Introductions on Laradock
channel.description: Recent content in Introductions on Laradock

item.title: 1. Introduction
item.description:
Use Docker First - Then Learn About It Later Laradock is a PHP development environment that runs on Docker. Supports a variety of useful Docker Images, pre-configured to provide a wonderful PHP development environment.
Sponsors For basic sponsorships go to Open Collective, for golden sponsorships contact support@laradock.io. Your logo will show up on the github repository index page and the documentation main page, with a link to your website.
